title: Hidden Mate
description: Finding my fated mate could bring death... or worse.I was born to one day lead our pack, but the current alpha—my father—doesn’t think I'm worthy.Going to college offers an escape, a chance to make a new beginning, to prove myself.On my first day, though, I find far more than I bargained for.My fated mate. Something that any wolf rejoices in finding.Except he’s forbidden.Choices must be made, and loyalties will be tested. With everything on the brink of destruction, only one thing is certain - my life will never be the same.Scroll up and one click HIDDEN MATE today.
author: Jen L. Grey
